# AiyagariIdiosyncratic

This is a replication of S. Rao Aiyagari (1994).


## References

Aiyagari, S. R. (1994). Uninsured idiosyncratic risk and aggregate saving. The Quarterly Journal of Economics, 109(3), 659-684.
